question: As per the Centre for Economics and Business Research (CEBR), India will become the third largest economy in which year?
explanation:
As per the Centre for Economics and Business Research (CEBR), Indian economy will grow by 9 per cent in 2021 and by 7 per cent in 2022.
It also forecasted that India will overtake the UK to become the worldâ€™s fifth largest economy in 2025. As per their forecast, India will Germany in 2027 and Japan in 2030 to become the third largest economy in the world.
